data.oai_dc:dc: A public survey conducted by TWIC in order to determine Kestrel, Buzzard and Red KIte abundance throughout the Lothians and the Scottish Borders. This survey started in 2014 and is still in progress. Red Kite data is not currently available as it is awaiting verification before upload to the NBN Atlas.|To determine species abundance throughout the Lothians and Borders.|1,492 occurrences
